toast.copy: Copied! Your message is now ready for a world tour!

info.message_01: Clouder is powered by CHAT-GPT and can make mistakes. Check important info.

models.select_models_01_hint: Our model, trained with AWS Knowledges

login_form.signup: Sign in to an existing cloud
login_form.select_pin_field_subtitle: Google, work email? Doesn't matter, you can use any email to Login

login_messages.message_fourth: Clouder isn't a simple AI tool, it is an universe where won't need to go out to find somethnig

recovery.subtitle: We have a quick and secure system to help you recover your account. First, please provide your email address. We will then send you an email with a PIN to reset your password. :)
recovery.title_message: Sometimes we just forgot our things, but don't worry
recovery.input_placeholder: Input email address where you'll recieve the magic link
recovery.email_just_sent_title: Knock Knock, take a look to your email, we just send a maigc link to:
recovery.email_just_sent_subtitle: If you have an account with us, you will recieve the message

registration.select_avatar_subtitle: Choose an avatar that best represents you. You can change it later.
registration.select_avatar_field_title_hint: Choose an avatar that best represents you, in the future you will be able to create your own avatar
registration.select_pin_field_subtitle: PIN are better than confirmation emails, right?
registration.redirect_counter: You will be redirect in {{timeLeft}} seconds
registration.submit_button_timer_block: You're being blocked for {{timeLeft}} seconds, try again later

errors.empty_field_default_message: Input the PIN we sent to your email
errors.regex_field_default_message: This value in input is invalid

modals.incomplete_registration_message: We detected that you already have an account. Please complete the registration process. Confirm your email address to gain access.
modals.want_to_crate_account_by_google_auth: Your Google account does no exist in this app, but you can create it quickly
modals.want_to_crate_account_by_google_auth_tit: Do you want to create an account?
modals.want_to_crate_account_by_google_auth_acc: Yes, create my account with Google
modals.want_to_crate_account_by_google_auth_den: No, let me use my email

backend.invalid_method: Request isn't valid, please check payload or headers
backend.user_created: User created successfully, continue to the PIN confirmation
backend.user_exist: User already exists, but is not confirmed. You will be redirect to PIN confirmation, check your email
